Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Uh oh. She's doing it again.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Phyllis has gotten into audio books and lately she's been listening to 50 Shades of Grey. Which, if you don't know what it is, it's a book about um...

Quote.Speaker: Clark
Quote.Text: It's porn.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Yeah.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [Phyllis rocks her chair into his provocatively] Seriously. Ugh. Ok, this is unacceptable. It's officially a hostile work environment.

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: Why?

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Somebody just needs to get her attention, tell her it's not OK to do this in public.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Be careful. I pulled my mom's dog off a pillow once, and I got bit.

Quote.Speaker: Meredith
Quote.Text: Just ignore her. Sooner or later she'll finish.

Quote.Speaker: Group
Quote.Text: Ugh. Ew.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: What?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Phyllis is masturbating. In the office right now as we speak.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Can we skip the color commentary and just have Andy go out there and fire her?

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: He- he can't do that. Turns out she's allowed to have feelings of sexual arousal. It doesn't become a violation until she physically acts on it.

Quote.Speaker: Group
Quote.Text: No!

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Toby, how do you propose that we-

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Whoa, whoa, whoa, wait a minute. Why is Phyllis so aroused?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: She's listening to 50 Shades of Grey.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Well there you go. That's muy caliente.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: OK, you are useless. I'll take care of this. [walks out of Andy's office and dumps water on Phyllis]

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: What the hell?!

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: It's OK guys, she's no longer horny.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Excuse me, dirty birdie [takes Phyllis' iPod]

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: Wait, what?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: You can have this back at the end of the day. [cut to Andy listening to the iPod and looking aroused, water is dumped on him] Oh!!

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Clark, I need your advice. I'm having some lady troubles.

Quote.Speaker: Clark
Quote.Text: What's her name?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Esther Ruger. [Angela makes a face in the background]

Quote.Speaker: Clark
Quote.Text: Sweet.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Lives on the neighboring farm. 85 acres.

Quote.Speaker: Clark
Quote.Text: Oh yeah. Keep talkin'.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Well, we've been out three times, there has been physicality but the thing is we were hanging out with her father the other night looking at a farm catalog, next thing I know he wants to lease a tractor with me.

Quote.Speaker: Clark
Quote.Text: Oh.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [laughs] What do you think?

Quote.Speaker: Clark
Quote.Text: The same thing that you think.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: A long term tractor lease is going to put pressure on a relationship.

Quote.Speaker: Clark
Quote.Text: God, one of my buddies is going through the same thing right now. Something in the air.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Here you go. And good for you Dwight, I'm so glad you found someone. I bet she's got kind eyes.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Dwight is dating a brussel sprout farmer named Esther. She's coming here this afternoon with her father. Who knows? Maybe she'll be pulling the horse cart! [laughs]

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: [on phone] Cici has been calling me 'Pamela'. Like four times this week.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Oh man. [laughs]

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: I wonder if she'll start calling you 'Jim'.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Oh boy, please don't. Let's not let that happen.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: [laughs] Um.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: What was I gonna- What was I gonna say?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: You're- You know your assistant told me that you have a big pitch meeting today. With Ryan Howard. How did that happen?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Not that Ryan Howard. Um, the Phillies' first baseman.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Oh, oh OK.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Yeah, yeah. Exactly.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: [sighs] Um, Ok. Well?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Yeah. So, uh, I'll uh, talk to you later?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Yeah, sounds good. Ok.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Ok great.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Ok.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Bye.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Bye.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: [Meredith laughs] What's going on? Oh, did Gangnam Style put out a new song?

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: There's a promo for the new documentary on the web.

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: Play it again.

Quote.Speaker: Promo Voice
Quote.Text: [Music begins, Michael Scott is shown] The boss. [Pam and Dwight are shown in episodes past] The workers. [Ryan and Michael are shown] The lives. [Jim and Pam and Dwight and Angela are shown] The loves. [More flashback clips] The people. The paper. The Office: An American Workplace. Coming soon on WVIA.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Whoa. You go to the bathroom for 45 minutes and everything changes.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: This is a documentary? Oh, I always thought we were like specimens in a human zoo.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: [Angela is rewatching the promo and looks nervous about the part with her and Dwight] Did you see this? [lifts monitor in her direction]

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Your screen is all black. You just unplugged your computer.

Quote.Speaker: Clark
Quote.Text: [Pam smiles as she watches the promo with her and Jim on the roof] Oh my god, is that you and Jim?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Uh huh.

Quote.Speaker: Clark
Quote.Text: Jeez, you fell in love with that hair? Really? [laughs] Yikes. That is awful.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: It wasn't so bad.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Guys, are you reading the online comments? Somebody commented on my banjo playing. "Banjo at 0:19 is aight" Internet, calm down! I must be really connected with this guy. I mean that's the guy's name, right? ChobbleGobbler?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Hey man, how you doin'? Jim Halpert.

Quote.Speaker: Ryan Howard
Quote.Text: Nice to meet you. Eat Fresh.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Hey, man. Darryl.

Quote.Speaker: Ryan Howard
Quote.Text: Hey there, Ryan. Nice to meet you. Eat Fresh. [to camera] Eat Fresh.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Let's go to the conference room.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Esther's on her way up. I wonder if she wants a snack. Let's see, I know she likes apples and carrots.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: I bet she does. I bet she'll eat them right out of your hand with those big strong teeth.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Did I tell you about her teeth?

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Hey Dwight, you have some guests. I think they're from the forest where we harvest our paper.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Yes.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Ah, the Ruger family. Welcome.

Quote.Speaker: Mr. Ruger
Quote.Text: Fine office you have here. Sturdy walls.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Yes. Esther, you look radiant as always.

Quote.Speaker: Esther
Quote.Text: Thank you. [Dwight kisses her forehead]

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: I guess men find Esther attractive. I mean if there are chubby chasers, then there are men that like that....thing.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Weird to see how we used to look in those promos. Some of us have changed so much.

Quote.Speaker: Stanley
Quote.Text: [eating soft pretzel] We've all changed.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: With our firm, you'll be building equity for long after they've retired your number.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: And we all know, baseball does not last forever.

Quote.Speaker: Ryan Howard
Quote.Text: I look at these actors on TV and I think: "C'mon, I can do that."

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Right? [laughs]

Quote.Speaker: Ryan Howard
Quote.Text: Watch this: Eat Fresh. Now what does that make you think of?

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Subway sandwiches.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Yep.

Quote.Speaker: Ryan Howard
Quote.Text: How? I didn't say Subway sandwiches. It's called playing the subtext.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Wow.

Quote.Speaker: Ryan Howard
Quote.Text: I actually wrote a screenplay, it's called "The Big Piece"

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Based on his nickname. Like it already. Let me guess, it's autobiographical.

Quote.Speaker: Ryan Howard
Quote.Text: Half biopic and half superhero movie. A mild mannered professional baseball player, Ryan Howard-

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: OK

Quote.Speaker: Ryan Howard
Quote.Text: -hits a home run into outer space. Ball comes back with space dust on it, which transforms him into: The Big Piece.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: The space dust does it.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Space dust.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Yeah.

Quote.Speaker: Ryan Howard
Quote.Text: I actually brought a- some copies of my script if you guys wanna read it together.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Sure, yeah. [laughs] Hollywood. [Ryan Howard pulls out 3 thick scripts] Alright.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Wow. Yeah, we gonna read it.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Ok, great.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Andy, are there documentary groupies?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Of course there are!

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Of course.

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: A little ironic that I'm going to be kind of a TV star, because my last Chad Flendermen novel [groups groans] was based on a murdered TV star. The small screen-

Quote.Speaker: Nellie
Quote.Text: Oh, I don't care.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Hey guys, I just found another promo. It's in Danish. I guess it's gonna start airing in Denmark.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Oh my god!

Quote.Speaker: Promo Announcer
Quote.Text: [Speaks Danish]

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: What was that word they said when they showed me "Skrald mand"? What's that mean in Danish? Cool guy? [Oscar looks it up]

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Dumpster Man.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Cool. Superhero.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: What about me? "Klokken tre pige"

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: "Three PM Girl"

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: What? Why would they...wait a second, wait a second! What was that? [pauses on her and Dwight leaving the warehouse area where they've just had sex] Oh! I didn't know they were filming then!

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: It looks like the camera man was hiding behind the shelves.

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: Wait. So they were filming all the time? Even when we didn't know it?

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Oh my god. [All look at camera horrified]

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: There was much more secret filming than I expected. [laughs] But I am fine with it, I mean it. I am.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Are you kidding me? It's like half the show is secret footage.

Quote.Speaker: Meredith
Quote.Text: I am a very private person. I show 'em when I wanna show 'em. Who wants a taste? [lifts shirt to flash camera] Boob sauce!

Quote.Speaker: Group
Quote.Text: No!

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Meredith!

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Come on!

Quote.Speaker: Nellie
Quote.Text: Oh my god. Do they film us at night when we're sleeping?

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Yes, Erin. They film us at night when we're sleeping. Cause that makes great TV!

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Hey.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Oscar.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: I'm sorry sweetie. This whole thing is just freaking me out.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: I have been very honest with you guys. In a way that could seriously impact the political career of a very good friend of mine. You're not going to use any of that, are you?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: People, relax! We are killing it online. Have you guys checked the comments? SmokeThatSkinwagon says: "You guys are killing it!" I mean, we're internet sensations guys!

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: I think we need to figure out what's going on. I might just take a little walk.

Quote.Speaker: Stanley
Quote.Text: Yes, a little walk sounds like a good idea. [groups moves to warehouse and you can hear Erin whispering something]

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Ok everyone, turn off your mikes.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: We need to know more. Did their shots have sound? What exactly did they get on tape?

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: I sneezed into my hands without using Purell and then dipped into the candy jar. Did they film that?

Quote.Speaker: Nellie
Quote.Text: My first week here I sneezed directly into the candy jar because I thought I'd get more [Angela and Oscar make disgusted faces] I thought I'd get more screen time than anyone.

Quote.Speaker: Pete
Quote.Text: Ok, Pam. Why don't you visit your buddy, the crew guy that got fired? Find out what they got.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Brian?

Quote.Speaker: Pete
Quote.Text: Yeah.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Yeah, I guess I could.

Quote.Speaker: Stanley
Quote.Text: Hurry Pam, I need to know how much hellfire is going to rain down on me.

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: I thought Terry knew about Cynthia?

Quote.Speaker: Stanley
Quote.Text: She does. But neither of them know about Lydia.

Quote.Speaker: Group
Quote.Text: Oh!

Quote.Speaker: Meredith
Quote.Text: Wow.

Quote.Speaker: Clark
Quote.Text: Whoa! Whoa! OK, so what's this lever do?

Quote.Speaker: Ruger Sister 1
Quote.Text: That manipulates the secondary shaft.

Quote.Speaker: Clark
Quote.Text: Oh, the secondary shaft. Eeeh, oooga! [laughs]

Quote.Speaker: Salesmen
Quote.Text: The lift capacity's up at two thousand pounds. That's a lot of beets.

Quote.Speaker: Mr. Ruger
Quote.Text: Let's talk terms. If you agree to a forty sixty split on this tractor, I'll store it in one of my barns.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Mr. Ruger, are you trying to take advantage of me because I'm interested in your daughter? Fifty fifty split or no deal.

Quote.Speaker: Mr. Ruger
Quote.Text: Esther, get in the truck.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Ok ok ok, wait! You win. [shakes hands]

Quote.Speaker: Salesman
Quote.Text: Let's get the paperwork started.

Quote.Speaker: Ruger Sister 2
Quote.Text: We should buy an auger together.

Quote.Speaker: Clark
Quote.Text: Oh, yeah. Yeah.

Quote.Speaker: Ruger Sister 1
Quote.Text: You would be a great one to buy an auger with.

Quote.Speaker: Stanley
Quote.Text: [on phone] Hello, honey? I just spoke to the TV repair man, he says we need to keep our TVs turned off for a couple of months. Something about the wiring.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Oh! Seven new comments. "The guy at 0:19 is hawt!" [typing] "Hi Bongripper, it's me, Andy. The guy from 0:19, I'm glad that you enjoyed my work in that promo. I really enjoyed your comment, going to read some more comments now. Have a great day!"[reading] "He's not hawt, he's gay." [typing] "Dear JasonJasonJason, it's me, Andy. Nice name. Not! Guess what? I'm not gay! So you are an IDIOT. And I am hawt, according to people on this site who have a brain. Never comment on this page ever again." [reading] "He is hawt!" See, thank you, that's more like it. "He is butt." God dammit! I'm about to lose my FREAKING MIND! Screw you TexasPoonTappa! Uh!

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Security deposit. That's been-

Quote.Speaker: Mr. Ruger
Quote.Text: Standard.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Right, standard.

Quote.Speaker: Clark
Quote.Text: Hey, can I talk to you for one second?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: No.

Quote.Speaker: Clark
Quote.Text: One second.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: No.

Quote.Speaker: Clark
Quote.Text: One second.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: I am closing a deal on a tractor with the father of a woman I plan to inseminate.

Quote.Speaker: Clark
Quote.Text: Don't do it. [takes Dwight's pen]

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: What? Don't you cap that pen. Do not cap that pen! Do not! Ugh! You capped it. Wow. You are serious. Ok, you've got two minutes and then the cap comes off.

Quote.Speaker: Clark
Quote.Text: Dude, we're being conned.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Go on.

Quote.Speaker: Clark
Quote.Text: These chicks are way too hot to be into us. Esther's just pretending to like you so that you'll buy her daddy a new tractor.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: No.

Quote.Speaker: Clark
Quote.Text: Yes. Her sister's trying to seduce me into buying an auger with her.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: What? Has the warranty expired on the auger you have now?

Quote.Speaker: Clark
Quote.Text: I don't even know what an auger is!

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: No woman would ever want a man who doesn't know what an auger is.

Quote.Speaker: Mr. Ruger
Quote.Text: Hey, you ready to sign?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: I just need a moment to consider your offer. Excuse me. [grabs Clark]

Quote.Speaker: Brian
Quote.Text: Oh, hey!

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Hey!

Quote.Speaker: Brian
Quote.Text: Hi. [laughs]

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Hi, um. I'm sorry, do you have a minute? Is this a bad time?

Quote.Speaker: Brian
Quote.Text: No, no, please, yeah, come on in. It's good to see you. Sorry, my place is usually not this-

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Oh my gosh, please, don't.

Quote.Speaker: Brian
Quote.Text: Yeah, no, I- actually it's always like this. [laughs] Do you want to go outside? It's a little less cluttered out there.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Sure, yeah. Yeah.

Quote.Speaker: Brian
Quote.Text: Let me grab a couple drinks.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: OK. [Goes out onto terrace] Oh wow, you have a nice view.

Quote.Speaker: Brian
Quote.Text: Alright, that's for you. [hands her beer]

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Oh, thank you.

Quote.Speaker: Brian
Quote.Text: Cheers.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Cheers.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: [Plays boom box to drown out sound] Alright, how much have you revealed on camera about your relationship with the senator?

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: They caught us kissing on Halloween.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Oh! He was dressed like Ronald Reagan! [Slaps Oscar]

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Oh!

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: God!

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Angela! Well he kissed like Jack Kennedy!

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Oh! [slaps him again] Stop it! Stop kissing him! Someone needs to call and warn him. This could ruin his career.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Well, I don't like giving him bad news.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Call him!

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: You call him!

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Call him! [hits Oscar]

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Stop hitting me!

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Call him! Call him!

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: No!

Quote.Speaker: Brian
Quote.Text: So...

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: So..

Quote.Speaker: Brian
Quote.Text: What brings you by?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Well, the promo for the documentary aired today.

Quote.Speaker: Brian
Quote.Text: Oh yeah, that's right.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Yeah. It's kinda crazy.

Quote.Speaker: Brian
Quote.Text: Yeah, it is.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: See all this like old stuff, like um, there's that shot of Jim and I up on the roof?

Quote.Speaker: Brian
Quote.Text: Oh yeah, that was, that was a good moment.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Yeah, wasn't that neat?

Quote.Speaker: Brian
Quote.Text: Yeah, it was cool.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Yeah, and there's this one when we were listening to music and it's like, it's like w were in love and we didn't even know we were in love and it's...but- Do you think Jim's changed?

Quote.Speaker: Brian
Quote.Text: Um...

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: I'm sorry. Did that? That was out of the blue-

Quote.Speaker: Brian
Quote.Text: No no, it's-

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: I just mean because you know us and you like observed us for ten years and I feel like he's- I just feel like...he's so into his work right now and....I don't know, am I crazy?

Quote.Speaker: Brian
Quote.Text: No, you're not crazy.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Well, I wish that made me feel better. Listen, so everybody saw the promos and they're kinda freaking out. [Brian laughs] Cause it seems like you got a lot of private stuff on camera-

Quote.Speaker: Brian
Quote.Text: Yeah.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: You know, stuff people didn't intend for everyone to see. And they kinda want to know how much.

Quote.Speaker: Brian
Quote.Text: They want to know how much what?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: How much stuff you got.

Quote.Speaker: Brian
Quote.Text: Pretty much everything.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Well yeah, but what if we turned our mike packs?

Quote.Speaker: Brian
Quote.Text: They've got parabolic mikes, they can pick you up a hundred yards away, so...no if you were around there, they got you.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: So we basically had no privacy for ten years.

Quote.Speaker: Brian
Quote.Text: That's not really true, I mean-

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Um...yeah, I gotta, I gotta go.

Quote.Speaker: Brian
Quote.Text: Oh no, hang on a second. Pam, I'm sorry, I- I- I can explain this so much better.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: No I think you explained it.

Quote.Speaker: Brian
Quote.Text: Look, if you give me a chance I can, I- [Pam leaves] Pam.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: "Together we will win this baseball game against the evil space Yankees. Eat Fresh."

Quote.Speaker: Ryan Howard
Quote.Text: That'll pay for the exploding helicopter.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Smart.

Quote.Speaker: Ryan Howard
Quote.Text: "Suddenly, the evil thugs break in to the stadium. The Big Piece hits baseballs at the evil thugs."

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: "Buy me some peanuts and cracker jacks."

Quote.Speaker: Ryan Howard
Quote.Text: Come on man, sell it!

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Yeah, Jim.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: [louder] "Buy me some peanuts and cracker jacks!"

Quote.Speaker: Ryan Howard
Quote.Text: Yeah, that's better. A bunch of hot women go: "Oh yeah!"

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: "Megan, I was too shy to tell you this when I was just a normal professional baseball player, but I love you."

Quote.Speaker: Ryan Howard
Quote.Text: "They kiss. It is super emotional. Like in Toy Story."

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Wow. I tell you what, it's really strong. I can't wait to read the rest of it later and see how it ends.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: It's so strong.

Quote.Speaker: Ryan Howard
Quote.Text: Keep reading then.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: "Gotta go! Darth Vader's launching a huge attack."

Quote.Speaker: Ryan Howard
Quote.Text: Um another thing. I'm gonna need you to get me the rights to Darth Vader.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: I don't know how we'd go about doing that.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: We can look into it.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: We'll look into it.

Quote.Speaker: Ryan Howard
Quote.Text: We need Darth.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: We gotta get him.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: We'll go after Darth then.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: We're gonna go get him.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: That's what we gotta do.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: We're gonna get him.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Maybe you're right. Esther's a ten and the best I've ever done is Angela who's a nine and she rejected me.

Quote.Speaker: Clark
Quote.Text: A Scranton nine, but yeah, point taken. Hey, let's go out tonight and just score a couple fours huh? I mean there are no games with fours.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Who needs a new tractor anyway? Maybe we're the kinda guys who end up with a tractor that's already been rode hard and put away muddy.

Quote.Speaker: Clark
Quote.Text: Screw new tractors. Guys like us, we gotta plant our seed a different way.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: By hand.

Quote.Speaker: Esther
Quote.Text: Dwight, we need to talk.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: I don't know that there's anything left for us to talk about, Esther.

Quote.Speaker: Esther
Quote.Text: Look, we're gonna have the tractor for the same amount of work days but my dad is planning on leasing it to the Vanderkirk brothers on the weekends.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: No.

Quote.Speaker: Esther
Quote.Text: So you're going to be paying more, but he's putting on ten times the miles and he's pocketing a profit behind your back.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: That snake!

Quote.Speaker: Esther
Quote.Text: You need to tell him you want a deal based on miles or he can just stick that tractor where the sun don't shine.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: That shady grove out by Willard's pond.

Quote.Speaker: Esther
Quote.Text: Mmhm.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: So, you're fine with me not leasing the tractor? I mean, our courtship can proceed?

Quote.Speaker: Esther
Quote.Text: Of course. [laughs] You didn't just think I was tractor bait, did you?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [laughs] No!

Quote.Speaker: Clark
Quote.Text: Hey Dwight, what's an auger used for?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Post hole digging. [points and laughs with Esther]

Quote.Speaker: Esther
Quote.Text: Stupid.

Quote.Speaker: Senator
Quote.Text: [On speakerphone] You've reached Senator Robert Lipton, please leave a message. [beep]

Quote.Speaker: Angela & Oscar
Quote.Text: Hi honey!

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Oh you?

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: No you go. Hi honey!

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Hey, Hey Robert!

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: It's Angela and Oscar.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Hey.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Just a few quick things.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Um the documentary's going to be airing soon, and, and you look great in the promos.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Oh you look so handsome! Very presidential.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Very much so.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Yeah.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Absolutely.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Yeah!

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Hey, I get the sense you're gonna be outed as gay.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Yes and I cheated on you with Dwight, it looks like they got it on film. I didn't tell you about it.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: I think that's it!

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: I think we're good.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Done!

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Bye!

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Ok!

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Love you! [Oscar hangs up] God.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: [on video] Hey! TexasPoonTappa and JasonJasonJason and all the rest of you haters out there! Check this out. [plays banjo, screen types out "you suck my nutz" from TexasPoonTappa, camera zooms out to reveal Nellie]

Quote.Speaker: Nellie
Quote.Text: Good night Andy.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Huh? Yeah, see ya. [sees comment] Oh! What?! [starts crying]

Quote.Speaker: Promo Announcer
Quote.Text: [Speaks Danish]

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: I hope you got sound on everything. I'd love a DVD of that. [at computer opens translator. Types in "Elskere" which comes back as "lovers" Pam smiles]
